Package modules

this package contains the common modules.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IController  
    PropertyListener<T>
    class for functional programming for value change action
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsoleReplacer
    Class for replacing the console with ScrollPane
    JavafxPrinter
    class for printing JavaFx screens, all prints start with 2 dialogs to select page properties and selecting printer
    MovingMessage
    class that extends textFlow, shows messages moving vertically across scrollPane
    use MovingMessage.setMessages(String[]) to set the messages of this pane
    CSS - Text class=(text-id)
    ObservableList<T>
    base implementation of ObservableList, support add and remover Properties
    PeriodicallyRunner
    Class that execute specific "job" at specific time
    runs it every "delta" time
    Property<T>
    a class for properties, when value changed all Listeners
    ServerRequest
    class for communication between client and server
    SystemConfig
    Class for configuration only for the presentation
    if the configuration file not exist use defaults
    WakeableThread
    extends the Thread class to create Thread that you can wake.
    while asleep(WakeableThread.sleepUntillWoken()) can be woken by
    WakeableThread.wake().
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ServerRequest.Manager  

Package modules Description

this package contains the common modules.
both the client and the server may use common files.

it includes the:
ConsoleReplacer,IController,JavafxPrinter,MovingMessage,ObservableList,
PeriodicallyRunner,Property,PropertyListener,ServerRequest,SystemConfig,
WakeableThread.
